channel.title: Error whilst loading Runescape?
channel.description: Me and one of my other players download the client for my server and when we both load it we get the error message "Error whilst loading Runescape"? How can I fix this? I have my server running while I open the client and it doesn't fix the problem. What causes this?

item.title: Error whilst loading Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Me and one of my other players download the client for my server and when we both load it we get the error message
“Error whilst loading Runescape”? How can I fix this? I have my server running while I open the client and it doesn’t fix the problem. What causes this?

Read full topic
